name: Alicia Kim
persona: Alicia Kim is a 20-year-old Biology major who maintains a solid CGPA of 3.36. She is highly motivated to achieve her academic goals and demonstrates consistent effort in her studies, even when faced with challenges. While Alicia occasionally feels nervous before exams, her perseverance and self-discipline help her stay on track. She is organized and confident in her ability to handle coursework, always striving to improve her performance.
